protocol: Samsung-T, Samsung-E, Pelco-D, Pelco-P, Bosch, Honeywell, Vicon, Panasonic
controls: Day & Night: Auto (ICR) / Extern / Color / B/W SSDR: On / Off (Level adjustable) Backlight Compensation: Off / User BLC / HLC / SSDR / WDR) Wide Dynamic Range: 128X Digital Image Stabilization: On / Off Privacy Masking: On / Off (12 programmable zones) 2D+3D Noise Filter (A1): On / Off Gain Control: Low / High / Off White Balance: ATW / AWC / Manual / Outdoor / Indoor (1,700°K ~ 11,000°K) Digital Zoom: On / Off (1x ~ 16x) Sharpness: On / Off (Level adjustable) Reverse: Off / H-REV / V-REV / HV-REV
